name: Math it
description:
Click on numbers and combine them with the operations.

Reach the correct target number on top of the screen to advance in levels, and reach the TOP OF THE LEADERBOARD!

🎉 If your last number is within 0.5 to the target number, I'll allow you to advance to next level 🎉

Can you make it to the LEVEL 20? that's where the difficuly is at its highest!
